title: Bent Inge Johnsen
text:
Bent Inge Johnsen (born 28 January 1972 in <a href="Mosj%C3%B8en">Mosjøen</a>, <a href="Helgeland">Helgeland</a>) is the manager of <a href="3.%20divisjon">3. divisjon</a> club <a href="Lyn%20Fotball">Lyn</a>.
A former <a href="Norway">Norwegian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player and current coach, Johnsen was versatile and could play as <a href="Defender%20%28football%29">defender</a>, <a href="Midfielder%20%28football%29">midfielder</a> and <a href="Forward%20%28football%29">forward</a>.
He started his career with local <a href="Mosj%C3%B8en%20IL">Mosjøen IL</a>, then joined top-flight team <a href="FK%20Bod%C3%B8/Glimt">Bodø/Glimt</a>. After 5 years with the club he moved to <a href="Norway">Norway</a>'s top club <a href="Rosenborg%20BK">Rosenborg</a> and made 65 league appearances in 3 years. He then moved to his final club, <a href="Odd%20Grenland">Odd Grenland</a> and retired in 2006, aged 34.
